Detailed Description

A pure virtual base class for all subsystems in the Octor control system.

The run priority for various subsystems are set in the global config file 'octor.cfg', except for the QMotor control loop, whose priority is specified in the QMotor config file (see 'OA6.cfg').

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SubSystem::SubSystem (  int  shutdownPriority,
const char *  desc = NULL
) 
 

Parameters:
shutdownPriority Provide shutown priority in range 0 - 10. 0: lowest priority - will be shutdown last 10: highest priority - will be shutdown first Note that subsystems with the same priority may be shutdown in any order when the system goes down.
desc A descriptiion of the subsystem (less than 80 chars)

virtual SubSystem::~SubSystem (   )  [virtual]
 

Shuts down the subsystem, if not done already, and delete reference to the system in the global list of subsystems.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void SubSystem::startShutdown (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Start shutdown of the subsystem. Use this method to break interconnection with other subsystems, do things that must be done before an actual shutdown, or notify the sub system that a call to shutdown is coming

Implemented in OA6, OA6NetTraGen, OA6StatusBroadcast, and OA6TraGen.

virtual void SubSystem::shutdown (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Shutdown the subsystem.

Implemented in OA6, OA6NetTraGen, OA6StatusBroadcast, and OA6TraGen.
